projects.title: This site
projects.desc: [IN PROGRESS] This is the site you are currently using. I developed it using the React.JS (JavaScript). For the styling, I wrote (almost) everything from scratch in pure CSS. I don't want any more bloat!!

projects.title: Student Performance Prediction
projects.desc: Part of AI4ALL. My very first ML project. We trained a random forest model to predict sudents' performance based on several background factors.

projects.title: Music genre classification
projects.desc: Part of AI4ALL. A project to classify music tracks into 19 different genres. Our team used the Fast Fourier Transform to confert each track into a 2d matrix, and then ran image classification on it.

projects.title: Blabber
projects.desc: CS1 Lab Assignment. A CLI app that behaves like Twitter. Users can create and account, 'Blab', follow, unfollow, see a timeline, and delete their account.

projects.title: Persian Word Extractor
projects.desc: Granted, not the most efficient piece of Python code. I used it to add the 'Persian 1k' & 'Persian 5k' tests to Monkeytype.com (aka the best typing-test website ever made)
